###4.2
About the Debugger
The ProDev WorkShop Debugger is a source-level debugging tool that provides special views for displaying program data and execution status.
Click on each of the planets for a description of the various functions of the Debugger.
use graphical views for displaying local variables, source-level expressions, array variables, and data structures
get dynamic updates of views as the program executes
manage fast data watchpoints and other traps
debug code at the machine level
